author: Rick Noack, Emily Rauhala, Griff Witte
title: As over 100,000 rally for Ukraine, Germany announces vast defense spending increase that may upend European security policy
description: Germany, Europe’s biggest economy and the most populous nation in the European Union, had long frustrated the United States and allies across the continent with its hesitation to invest more in its military.
